title: Report Phishing Email
description: A staff member receives a suspicious email asking for their password and reports it to IT.

tasks.description: Instruct the user not to click any links and to forward the email as an attachment to the security office.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides immediate, clear security instructions.

tasks.description: The security team analyzes the email and confirms it is a phishing attempt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Security team identifies the malicious nature of the email.

tasks.description: The security team implements a block for the sender's domain and sends a campus-wide warning if the campaign is widespread.
tasks.expected_outcome: Security team takes preventative measures to protect the campus.
